name: Default Dungeon
description:
A Puzzle platformer made during the Brackeys Jam 2021. You control three characters with unique abilities. Use each characters abilities to make it through the dungeon.

Hammer Guy - Loves swinging his hammer and very useful against incoming enemies.

Jump Guy - Former high jump champion and very useful for reaching high places.

Builder Guy - Builds and places ladders, so he's more of a Carpenter but who am I to argue.

Explore 10 Levels including a secret level. "What Secret" you might ask, all I have to say is 1-1
